description: LogicStar doesn't even need to  show how you can fix a bug. Just pinpointing the exact location of the bug already saves a lot of time.
name: Ori D.

description: If I have a bug, I'd love to have an agent that finds the right files, tries to reproduce the bug, it fixes the bug and then it verifies that it's correct so I can review it.
name: Arvid L.

description: Engineers often face frustration navigating the multiple combinations of inputs needed to reproduce an issue. I appreciate how LogicStar proposes to simplify the challenging task of reproducing issues, saving valuable time in MTTR.
name: Sam R.

description: ...having 20 things that we canâ€™t fix automatically is a bunch of noise, having 1 proposed solution that appears to fix something is much more interesting
name: Timoty J.
